constraints.name: node_degree_constraint
constraints.description: 一个节点（石子）是活的当且仅当它至少有一个正交相邻的空节点，或者与一个同色的活节点在同一连通分量中。
constraints.formal: A node is alive if it has at least one orthogonally adjacent empty node, or it is in the same connected component with a live node of the same color.

constraints.name: path_connectedness
constraints.description: 两个同色节点直接相连当且仅当它们正交相邻。两个同色节点在同一个连通分量中当且仅当存在一个序列使得每对相邻节点直接相连。
constraints.formal: Two nodes s1 and sk of the same color are in the same connected group if there exists a sequence s1, s2, ..., sk such that for all 1 ≤ i < k, si-1 and si are of the same color and directly connected.

constraints.name: pairwise_exclusion
constraints.description: 一个白节点被黑节点捕获当且仅当它不是活的。
constraints.formal: A white node is captured by black nodes if it is not alive.

constraints.name: sign_inversion_operation
constraints.description: 每次翻转一个节点的颜色时，其他节点应恢复到原始颜色。
constraints.formal: Before flipping the color of a node, other nodes should revert to their original colors.

result.description: 计算在每次独立翻转一个棋子颜色后，被对方棋子包围的己方棋子数量

result.name: optimal_substructure
result.description: 最优子结构：每个棋子的状态（是否存活）取决于其直接相邻的棋子状态，整个棋盘的状态可以由局部状态组合而成。
